sentence.Network_en: Prices fluctuate from year to year.
Body temperature can fluctuate if you are ill.
sentence.Network_cn: 人患病后体温可能会上下波动。

sentence.Network_en: The actual cost may fluctuate above and below that standard.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际成本可在标准成本的上下范围内增减.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 曲根10000词汇电子讲义 - 豆丁网 ... conference 会议 fluctuate 波动，浮动（图表作文） confrontation 冲突.
大学英语六级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... flock n． 群，一群人，大量 v。聚结 fluctuate vi． 变动，上下，动摇 fluctuation n． 波动.
变字的解释--... ... 变坏〖 corrupt〗 变幻〖 changeirregularly;fluctuate〗 变幻莫测〖 unpredictable;capricious;fickle〗.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... flu 流感 fluctuate (物价)涨落，起落，波动 flux 流动；流.

list.abs: stable and rapid economic growth without fluctuations ., 稳定快速无大起大落的经济增长.
fluctuating stress 变化应力fluctuating 脉动fluctuation correction factor 涨落校正因子

TOEIC词汇汇总 ... expense 消耗；消费 13. fluctuation 波动；起伏；涨落 14. gross 总共的；全部的 15.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin fluctuat- 'undulated', from the verb fluctuare, from fluctus 'flow, current, wave', from fluere 'to flow'

entry.def: If something fluctuates, it changes a lot in an irregular way.

example.ex: Body temperature can fluctuate if you are ill.
example.tran: 人患病后体温可能会上下波动。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to fluctuate or move in a wave-like pattern
2. move or sway in a rising and falling or wavelike pattern;
3. be unstable; have ups and downs;

auth_sentence.content: The weightings fluctuate as the currencies' values change.
auth_sentence.res_content: The weightings fluctuate as the currencies' values change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The weightings fluctuate as the currencies' values change.

auth_sentence.content: The downside is that the withdrawal amount will fluctuate.
auth_sentence.res_content: The downside is that the withdrawal amount will fluctuate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The downside is that the withdrawal amount will fluctuate.

auth_sentence.content: It isn't that his income doesn't fluctuate.
auth_sentence.res_content: It isn't that his income doesn't fluctuate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It isn't that his income doesn't fluctuate.

Sentence.sentence: Bond prices generally fluctuate inversely (相反地)with current market interest rates.

means.word_mean: 波动, 涨落, 起伏

sentences.en: The price of vegetables fluctuates seasonally.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜的价格随季节变动。

jushi.english: The price of vegetables fluctuates seasonally.
jushi.chinese: 蔬菜的价格随季节变动。
